actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (as amended) to permit charitable contributions to the United Nations to be deductible for income tax purposes.

summary.text: Permits charitable contributions to the United Nations to be deducted for income tax purposes under the Internal Revenue Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 170 (c)91)).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (as amended) to permit charitable contributions to the United Nations to be deductible for income tax purposes.
